        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1854</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Hva er lyd?</string>
            <string language="en">What is sound ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist Ton?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quel est bruit ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é som?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è suono?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι είναι υγιής;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es sonido?</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hva er lyd? Utforsk forskjellig lydstyrke og frekvens.</string>
            <string language="en">What is sound? Explore various volum and frequency levels?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">frekvens</string>
            <string language="en">frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">lydstyrke</string>
            <string language="en">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">lydbølger</string>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist Ton? Erforschen Sie verschiedene volum und 
Frequenzstufen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quel est bruit ? Explorez les divers niveaux de 
volum et de fréquence ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é som? Explore vários níveis do volum e da 
freqüência?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è suono? Esplori i vari livelli di 
frequenza e di volum?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι είναι υγιής; Ερευνήστε τα διάφορα επίπεδα 
volum και συχνότητας;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es sonido? ¿Explore los varios niveles del 
volum y de la frecuencia?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frequenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenträger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schallwellen</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
